name: Warrick
text:
Warrick
Warrick works at the Silver Mustang Casino, where he was promoted from pit boss to supervisor following the firing of Burns.
Biography
Warrick observed a man win at every slot machine he used, totaling over thirty mega jackpots, earning him $425,000.
Following this, the casino supervisor, Burns, was fired by Rodney and Bradley Mitchum and replaced by Warrick, telling him to inform them if the man ever returned to the casino.
